routingNumber.description: The bank routing number to look up. Default: 121000248
routingNumber.title: Routingnumber

format.description: Accepted values: json, xml Default value: json Description: if you don't put this, it will default to json. if you need an XML response, add the query param into the url like this https://routing-number-bank-lookup.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/121000248?format=xml
format.title: Format

paymentType.description: Accepted values: ach, wire, all Default value: ach Description: if you don't put this, it will default to ACH. Bank information is a little different depending on whether you're trying to use the ACH system or the Wire Transfer system. You define what you want here. For example, if you need the Wire Transfer information, you'd add the query param into the url like this https://routing-number-bank-lookup.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/121000248?paymentType=wire. Generally ACH info is the most common, so if you don't know what any of this stuff means just leave this blank and let it default to ACH. You may also get both ACH and Wire information at the same time by passing paymentType=all
paymentType.title: Paymenttype
